page.title: 04Finchingfield amenities(cont
page.content: The Post office is another important place in the village where people come to post their letters and buy stamps and things. There are also two general food shops, a butchers shop,three craft shops and also one antique shop. Wiffens coach station is just off the village green from here coaches take people shopping and on excursions to the seaside and other interesting places. The Police station is a small village station manned by one policeman who patrols the streets. The upstairs of one of the Craft shops on the green is the Hairdressers where they cut and perm peoples hair and sell things like Nail varnish,hair conditioners and other beauty products.
